item.title: Can someone Help me Please?

                   [code] } if (NPCID == 2537) {//Miles
			// openUpShop(1);[/code]

And when I compile I now get one error saying case 17: is an orphaned case and the shop is still not opening any Idea’s?

item.title: Can someone Help me Please?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Go to client.java and search for

first click

Till you come across this

case 155:

And add the same code there.

This is mostly for npc’s who dont have trade option on him.

Case 155 triggers the shop to open by pressing on it with left mouse click.

item.title: Can someone Help me Please?
item.dc:creator: @ChuckCrapp ChuckCrapp
item.description:
@ChuckCrapp wrote:

Hello I’m trying to build my own server and I’m using a clean delta 317 source and client. My problem is that I’m trying to insert a shop and there is no shops in it to begin with so I dont have a starting point I have the code but I need a place to put the code Ive placed it were I thought I could put it and it compiles with no error’s but when I load it up the server the shop doesn’t open up. heres were I placed my code if anyone could tell me if this is right. If it’s something I’m doing wrong with the shop.cgf that would be great thanks

Heres were I placed my section of code for the shop:

// check shopping
if (WanneShop > 0) {

		if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) {
			openUpShop(WanneShop);
			WanneShop = 0;
	}
	else if (NPCID == 1) {//Man
		PutNPCCoords = true;
		WanneShop = 1; // test shop
		}		
	}
	// woodcutting check
	if (woodcutting[0] > 0) {
		if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, woodcutting[5]) == true) {
			closeInterface();

		}

The red part of the code is the code I have inserted.
Any help would be great thanks again.
-ChuckCrapp

Read full topic
